title: Should CafeSwap add farms for τBTC-BTCB and τBTC-BREW LP tokens?
body:
The Bitcoin Standard Hashrate project is underway, and liquidity only seems to exist on PancakeSwap so far.  τBTC aims to be a synthetic BTC-pegged token that is not controlled by Binance.  Other independent BTC bridge tokens akin to BTCB exist (pBTC, renBTC); but τBTC's peg mechanism is unique.

τBTC-BTC LP tokens are, in principle, a stablecoin pair; so they shouldn't incur much, if any, impermanent loss.  Adding a farm for this pair to CafeSwap will encourage the use of τBTC and decentralize the BSC ecosystem a little more away from PancakeSwap.  It will also bring BTC holders to the Café.

Furthermore, the only τBTC pair that exists with appreciable liquidity on PCS is τBTC-BTC.  More avenues to swap into τBTC might be good to have.  Perhaps it is worth considering also adding a BREW-τBTC LP farm.
choices: Yes, add a farm for τBTC-BTCB LP
Yes, add a farm for τBTC-BREW LP
No, do not add any τBTC farms
author: 0x28708db9724483Cf01E8d07A0375f99d18975EB8
